dailyFunStuff.title: Restaurants for the People is injecting $50 million into restaurants to feed the hungry!
dailyFunStuff.content:
The initiative was launched by the World Central Kitchen (WCK): a Washington DC-based charity whose "Food First Responders" program has already served millions of meals to people in dire circumstances around the world.

The money is being given to restaurants to pay for meals for those who need it most!

citation.name: Chef Andrés’ Charity is Injecting $50 Million into Restaurants By Paying Them to Feed the Hungry - Good News Network
